Policies *Prices are per adult in NZD, based on lead-in twin share accommodation in each of the specified categories. Valid until 16 November 2025 (unless sold out prior), is capacity controlled, subject to change/availability and can be withdrawn at any time without notice. Prices are subject to change due to fluctuations in charges, taxes and currency even after the deposit is paid. Agents may charge service fees and/or fees for card payments which vary. Cancellation penalties and conditions apply. Offers, fares and itineraries are subject to change or withdrawal without prior notice. New bookings only, all fares are subject to availability, may be withdrawn at any time, and are based on double occupancy. ^Included flight & accommodation in package price is based on a set cost and specific airline/hotel and booking class/room type. Should you wish to use an alternative flight or hotel, this cost may be used towards any airfare or hotel booked with your local travel expert at time of booking, surcharges may apply in the event your chosen flight or hotel cost exceeds that included in the package. Please note that no flights or accommodation are held until your local cruise expert confirms details back to you. The appropriate booking window for flights & accommodation will be advised at time of enquiry. +NCL Amenities: Beverage Package, Specialty Dining Package, and Internet Package is applicable to 1st and 2nd guest in the stateroom. Shore excursion credit is US$50 per excursion and is applicable to 1st guest in the stateroom. ~Exclusive US$100 Onboard Credit & Savings Offer: Onboard credit amount is per stateroom. Onboard credit is applied to the 1st and 2nd guest in the stateroom. Savings amount based on a balcony stateroom, all savings are included in advertised price and no further discounts apply. Offers are non-transferable, have no monetary value and are valid for new bookings only. Offers are subject to change or withdrawal at any time and combinability with other promotional offers is subject to change. For full terms and conditions visit ncl.com. (c)2024 NCL Corporation Ltd. NCL Australia Pty. Ltd. ABN 80 607 578 781. Ships’ Registry: Bahamas and USA. Some staterooms may have obstructed views.
